main.slogan: It is not just a trip, it is an experience.

second-section.title: A simple request equals a great experience
second-section.paragraph-1: From TravelSation we work so that you don't have to organize every detail of your trip you want to have.
second-section.paragraph-2: With a simple request you can forget about having to organize all the datails for you.

third-section.title: For all people - all the peace of mind, no headaches at all.
third-section.paragraph-1: You can be up and running in minutes and traveling as much as you want. Whatever your trip, TravelSation has you covered.
third-section.paragraph-2: Can have trip priced as they see fit, TravelSation does not set a minimum price.
